paper_abstract: This educational paper describes the implementation aspects, user interface design considerations and work-flow potential of the recently published TopOpt 3D App. The app solves the standard minimum compliance problem in 3D and allows the user to change design settings interactively at any point in time during the optimization. Apart from its educational nature, the app may point towards future ways of performing industrial design. Instead of the usual geometrize, then model and optimize approach, the geometry now automatically adapts to the varying boundary and loading conditions. The app is freely available for iOS at Apple's App Store and at http://www.topopt.dtu.dk/TopOpt3D for Windows and OSX.
paper_title: 3D interactive topology optimization on hand-held devices
